ICONIC AyoBeats MEETS WIRELESS FREEDOM

The Wireless Headphones of the Future. AyoBeats LifeMix™ lets you control how much you hear of your surroundings, from a perfect blend of your entertainment.... and life around you (Transparency) to shutting out the world (Active Noise Cancellation)!

Read More

Loud & Clear

People Aren't Hearing All The Music

It’s good to stay connected to what’s happening around you at home. This revolutionary AyoBeats technology uses advanced algorithms to seamlessly blend the sounds of life with your entertainment, so you can be immersed but not isolated. Control LifeMix with a simple touch on your headphones, or using the mobile app..
